an3.80:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.80:1.2: “sammukha metam, bhante, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an3.80:1.3: ‘bhagavato, ananda, sikhissa abhibhu nama savako brahmaloke thito sahassilokadhatum sarena vinnapesi’ti.
an3.80:1.4: Bhagava pana, bhante, araham sammasambuddho kivatakam pahoti sarena vinnapetun”ti?
an3.80:2.1: Dutiyampi kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.80:2.2: “sammukha metam, bhante, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an3.80:2.3: ‘bhagavato, ananda, sikhissa abhibhu nama savako brahmaloke thito sahassilokadhatum sarena vinnapesi’ti.
an3.80:2.4: Bhagava pana, bhante, araham sammasambuddho kivatakam pahoti sarena vinnapetun”ti?
an3.80:3.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.80:3.2: “sammukha metam, bhante, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
an3.80:3.3: ‘bhagavato, ananda, sikhissa abhibhu nama savako brahmaloke thito sahassilokadhatum sarena vinnapesi’ti.
an3.80:3.4: Bhagava pana, bhante, araham sammasambuddho kivatakam pahoti sarena vinnapetun”ti?
an3.80:3.7: yam bhagava bhaseyya. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
an3.80:3.9: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma anando bhagavato paccassosi.
an3.80:4.1: “Yavata, ananda, candimasuriya pariharanti, disa bhanti virocana, tava sahassadha loko.
an3.80:4.2: Tasmim sahassadha loke sahassam candanam, sahassam suriyanam, sahassam sinerupabbatarajanam, sahassam jambudipanam, sahassam aparagoyananam, sahassam uttarakurunam, sahassam pubbavidehanam, cattari mahasamuddasahassani, cattari maharajasahassani, sahassam catumaharajikanam, sahassam tavatimsanam, sahassam yamanam, sahassam tusitanam, sahassam nimmanaratinam, sahassam paranimmitavasavattinam, sahassam brahmalokanam—
an3.80:5.1: Yavatananda, sahassi culanika lokadhatu tava sahassadha loko.
an3.80:6.1: Yavatananda, dvisahassi majjhimika lokadhatu tava sahassadha loko.
an3.80:7.1: Akankhamano, ananda, tathagato tisahassimahasahassilokadhatum sarena vinnapeyya, yavata pana akankheyya”ti.
an3.80:8.1: “Yatha katham pana, bhante, bhagava tisahassimahasahassilokadhatum sarena vinnapeyya, yavata pana akankheyya”ti?
an3.80:8.3: Yada te satta tam alokam sanjaneyyum, atha tathagato ghosam kareyya saddamanussaveyya.
an3.80:8.4: Evam kho, ananda, tathagato tisahassimahasahassilokadhatum sarena vinnapeyya, yavata pana akankheyya”ti.
an3.80:9.1: Evam vutte, ayasma anando ayasmantam udayim etadavoca:
an3.80:9.4: Evam vutte, ayasma udayi ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an3.80:9.5: “kim tuyhettha, avuso ananda, yadi te sattha evammahiddhiko evammahanubhavo”ti?
an3.80:9.6: Evam vutte, bhagava ayasmantam udayim etadavoca:
an3.80:9.8: Sace, udayi, anando avitarago kalam kareyya, tena cittappasadena sattakkhattum devesu devarajjam kareyya, sattakkhattum imasmimyeva jambudipe maharajjam kareyya.
an3.80:9.9: Api ca, udayi, anando dittheva dhamme parinibbayissati”ti.
